title: Five top-quality fonts for exotic designs?
content:
From the [May 1st edition](http://web.archive.org/web/20060618115025/http:/www.typographer.org/2005_05_01_digests.html#111497422114520602) of Bald Condensed:  
_”(…) They all seem to suffer from the same disease that plagues Hollywood, content with releasing the Next tired remake of a classic blockbuster, or clogging the market with corny genre faces.”_

[This](http://web.archive.org/web/20060618115025/http:/www.linotype.com/6-2461-6/foreignlanguagepack.html?PHPSESSID=ded6594053176b2d11296d891ae20d80) epitomises everything that’s wrong with the current state of the type industry. I rest my case.

_Frankly, somebody should be held accountable and brought to justice for atrocities like this._
author: Bald Condensed
